QuestData.Title: Nal'ragas
QuestData.Description:
The Stonewright's medallion must not stay in the hands of the nathrezim.
From what the Accuser explained of our mission, the medallion is required if we wish to forge a new sigil for the Venthyr. I have no doubt that is why Nal'ragas and her ilk executed their ambush now.
The medallions are not subtle magic, and their affect on this realm is easily tracked. I suggest we give chase and eliminate this Nal'ragas before she can be reinforced.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A skilled infiltrator of the nathrazim.
